question: Determine the average normal stress developed on the cross section. Sketch the normal stress distribution over the cross section.<image 1>
description: The image depicts a cylindrical object with a hollow center. The outer diameter of the cylinder is 100 mm, and the inner diameter is 80 mm. A force of 300 kN is applied vertically downward at the top center of the cylinder. The label "F1-8" is present at the bottom of the image.
